General.Name: APT Medical Inc
General.Description: APT Medical Inc. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of electrophysiology and interventional medical devices in China. The company offers electrophysiological products comprising mapping catheters, ablation catheters, and transseptal needle and sheaths; and interventional cardiology and peripheral intervention products, such as access, diagnostic products, and therapeutic products. It also provides catheters, guidewires, delivery systems, and nitinol products in cardiology, peripheral, neurology, urology, etc. therapeutic applications, as well as accessories; and OEM/ODM services, including project design and development, customization, and volume OEM, etc. The company also exports its products to the United States, Japan, the European Union, Latin America, the Middle East, Russia, the Commonwealth of Independent States, and Africa. APT Medical Inc. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

1.Name: Mr. Zhenhua  Dai
1.Title: Deputy GM, CFO, Board Sec. & Director
